== Siroda (626863) ==

Siroda is a village in the [[Ponda]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 315 hectares and harbouring 3197 households with total population of 14041 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PONDA]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 6886 and female population is 7155. Scheduled Caste Population is 297 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2895. Census Location Code of the village is 626863<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
